languages.text: "С виду они не представляют угрозы — вскрытие нескольких экземпляров показало, что физиологически они идентичны обычному человеку. Следов скверны или ксеновмешательств также обнаружено не было. Однако их покорность — обоюдоострый клинок. Они слушаются любых приказов, не различая, от кого они исходят. Ничто не мешает какому-либо злоумышленнику при должной хитрости и коварстве подчинить их себе и получить в свое распоряжение армию послушных рабов или шпионов".

"They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens has shown that they are physiologically identical to ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-influence were found either. However, their obedience is a double-edged sword. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder from bending them to their will, creating an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."
languages.original_text: "С виду они не представляют угрозы — вскрытие нескольких экземпляров показало, что физиологически они идентичны обычному человеку. Следов скверны или ксеновмешательств также обнаружено не было. Однако их покорность — обоюдоострый клинок. Они слушаются любых приказов, не различая, от кого они исходят. Ничто не мешает какому-либо злоумышленнику при должной хитрости и коварстве подчинить их себе и получить в свое распоряжение армию послушных рабов или шпионов".

traits.locale_text: "They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens had shown that they are physiologically identical to the ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-tampering were found either. However, their obedience is a two-edged blade. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder to bend them to their will and get an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."

And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder to bend them to their will and get an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."

languages.text: “他们似乎不会构成威胁。技术人员解剖了几个样本，结果表明他们的生理结构与普通人完全相同，没有任何腐化或异形影响的痕迹。不过，他们的顺从特性是把双刃剑。他们会听从所有人的命令，并不在乎这些命令出自谁之口。因此，狡猾的入侵者可以不费吹灰之力，将他们纳入自己麾下，将他们变成一群听话的奴隶或间谍。”
languages.original_text: "They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens has shown that they are physiologically identical to ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-influence were found either. However, their obedience is a double-edged sword. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder from bending them to their will, creating an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: “他们似乎不会构成威胁。技术人员解剖了几个样本，结果表明他们的生理结构与普通人完全相同，没有任何腐化或异形影响的痕迹。不过，他们的顺从特性是把双刃剑。他们会听从所有人的命令，并不在乎这些命令出自谁之口。因此，狡猾的入侵者可以不费吹灰之力，将他们纳入自己麾下，将他们变成一群听话的奴隶或间谍。”
“他们似乎不会构成威胁。技术人员解剖了几个样本，结果表明他们的生理结构与普通人完全相同，没有任何腐化或异形篡改的痕迹。不过，他们的顺从特性是把双刃剑。他们会听从所有人的命令，并不在乎这些命令出自谁之口。因此，狡猾的入侵者可以不费吹灰之力，将他们纳入自己麾下，将他们变成一群听话的奴隶或间谍。”

languages.text: «No parecen suponer una amenaza: la autopsia de varios especímenes ha demostrado que son fisiológicamente idénticos a los humanos corrientes. Tampoco se han encontrado rastros de corrupción ni influencia xenos. Sin embargo, su obediencia es un arma de doble filo. Cumplen cualquier orden, sea cual sea y provenga de quien provenga. Por tanto, nada impide que un astuto intruso los doblegue a su voluntad y cree un ejército de esclavos y espías obedientes».
languages.original_text: "They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens has shown that they are physiologically identical to ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-influence were found either. However, their obedience is a double-edged sword. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder from bending them to their will, creating an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."

traits.locale_text: «No parecen suponer una amenaza: la autopsia de varios especímenes ha demostrado que son fisiológicamente idénticos a los humanos corrientes. Tampoco se han encontrado rastros de corrupción ni influencia xenos. Sin embargo, su obediencia es un arma de doble filo. Cumplen cualquier orden, sea cual sea y provenga de quien provenga. Por tanto, nada impide que un astuto intruso los doblegue a su voluntad y cree un ejército de esclavos y espías obedientes».

languages.text: 「彼らは脅威にはならないようです...いくつかの標本を解剖した結果、生理学的には普通の人間と同じであることが判明していますから。腐敗やゼノ改ざんの痕跡も見つかっていません。しかし、彼らの服従は諸刃の剣と言えましょう。彼らは誰からの命令であるかを知らず、気に留めることもなく、すべての命令に従います。つまり、狡猾な侵入者が彼らを意のままに操り、従順な奴隷軍やスパイ軍を自由に作ることだって可能になります」
languages.original_text: "They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens has shown that they are physiologically identical to ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-influence were found either. However, their obedience is a double-edged sword. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder from bending them to their will, creating an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."

「彼らは脅威にはならないようです...いくつかの標本を解剖した結果、生理学的には普通の人間と同じであることが判明していますから。腐敗やゼノ改ざんの痕跡も見つかっていません。しかし、彼らの服従は諸刃の剣と言えましょう。彼らは誰からの命令であるかを知らず、気に留めることもなく、すべての命令に従います。つまり、狡猾な侵入者が彼らを意のままに操り、従順な奴隷軍やスパイ軍を自由に作ることだって可能になります」

languages.text: « Ils semblent de prime abord inoffensifs, et l'autopsie de plusieurs spécimens a permis de montrer qu'ils étaient physiologiquement identiques à des humains ordinaires. De plus, on n'a détecté aucune trace de corruption ou d'influence xénos. Pour autant, leur obéissance est une arme à double tranchant. Ils suivent tous les ordres qu'on leur donne, sans se demander ou se soucier de qui ils émanent. Cela signifie qu'il est possible pour un intrus bien informé de les plier à sa volonté, s'octroyant ainsi une armée d'esclaves volontaires ou d'espions. »
languages.original_text: "They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens has shown that they are physiologically identical to ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-influence were found either. However, their obedience is a double-edged sword. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder from bending them to their will, creating an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."

languages.text: "Sie scheinen keine Gefahr darzustellen ... die Autopsie mehrerer Exemplare hat gezeigt, dass sie physiologisch gesehen identisch mit gewöhnlichen Menschen sind. Es wurden auch keinerlei Spuren von Verderbnis oder Xeno-Einflüssen gefunden. Ihr Gehorsam ist allerdings ein zweischneidiges Schwert. Sie befolgen jeden Befehl, ohne zu wissen oder sich dafür zu interessieren, wer ihn erteilt. Nichts hindert also tückische Eindringlinge, sie für ihre Zwecke einzusetzen und eine Armee gehorsamer Sklaven oder Spione aufzubauen."
languages.original_text: "They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens has shown that they are physiologically identical to ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-influence were found either. However, their obedience is a double-edged sword. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder from bending them to their will, creating an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."

"Sie scheinen keine Gefahr darzustellen — die Autopsie mehrerer Exemplare hat gezeigt, dass sie physiologisch gesehen identisch mit gewöhnlichen Menschen sind. Es wurden auch keinerlei Spuren von Verderbnis oder Xeno-Manipulation gefunden. Ihr Gehorsam ist aber ein zweischneidiges Schwert. Sie befolgen jeden Befehl, ohne zu wissen oder sich dafür zu interessieren, wer ihn erteilt. Nichts hindert also tückische Eindringlinge, sie für seine Zwecke einzusetzen und eine Armee gehorsamer Sklaven oder Spione aufzubauen."

languages.text: "Tehlike teşkil ediyor gibi görünmüyorlar. Birçok numune üzerinde yapılan otopsi, sıradan insanlarla fizyolojik açıdan özdeş olduklarını gösterdi. Yozlaşma ya da zeno nüfuzu izi de bulunamadı. Ancak itaatkârlıkları, iki ucu keskin bir kılıç misali. Tüm emirlere emri kimin verdiğini bilmeden ve umursamadan uyuyorlar. Bu nedenle de kurnaz bir istilacının onları kendi iradesine boyun eğdirip itaatkâr kölelerden ya da emrine amade casuslardan bir ordu oluşturmasını hiçbir şey engelleyemez."
languages.original_text: "They do not appear to pose a threat — the autopsy of several specimens has shown that they are physiologically identical to ordinary humans. No traces of corruption or xeno-influence were found either. However, their obedience is a double-edged sword. They obey any orders without knowing or caring who gives them. And thus, nothing prevents a cunning intruder from bending them to their will, creating an army of obedient slaves or spies at their disposal."
